item.description:
WHEN: Saturday, June 28, 2008 at 4:00 PM

WHERE: Firehouse Center for the Arts
1 Market Square
Newburyport , MA 01950
978-462-7336

COST: Free
HOW TO FIND THE ORGANIZER: "We will meetup right outside the FireHouse Center for the Arts. Usually under the shade of a tree"
--Jo (Event Planner Extraordinaire)

DETAILS:
ArtWalk galleries invite you to these special art-focused events. These are self-guided walking tours where you may enjoy artist receptions, light refreshments, new works of art, and more, at art destinations all within walking distance around town. Some galleries may stay open later. Start at any gallery, pick up a map, and continue through to other galleries.

*NOTE: THIS IS A VERY POPULAR EVENT! We will meetup right outside of The Fre House Center fo the Arts. Lots of walking so make sure you are dressed for the weather... comfy shoes! Many times the galleries have offered more than only 'refreshments: ) " This event has been cross posted with 2 oterh groups.. so we will have a large turnout! Go at your own pace.. if we split up? we can all meetup back at The Firehouse Center? or choose anotehr place. Anyone interested in staying for dinner after the walk, we can take a vote and decide on where to go.
INTERESTED IN CARPOOLING? Add it to your RSVP
**IF IT IS RAINING, THIS EVENT WILL MOST LIKELY BE CANCELED Before heading out, please check for an update..
item.how_to_find_us: We meetup directly outside of the Firehouse Center... if it's hot under the shady tree
item.why: This is a VERY popular event! I hosted several of these last year and they are a real success! VERY ENJOYABLE! And, VERY AFFORDABLE : ) It's so nice to stroll the streets of Newburyport where there is always something going on : )
item.name: ART WALK - Newburyport
